title: Provides that attorneys licensed to practice in the state may serve as a poll watcher in any city or county in the state
summary: Provides that attorneys licensed to practice in the state may serve as a poll watcher in any city or county in the state.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2348

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                   I N  S E N A T E

                                   January 19, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  Sen. ADDABBO -- read twice and ordered printed, and when
         printed to be committed to the Committee on Elections

       AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to watchers

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  Subdivision  4  of  section 8-500 of the election law, as
    2  amended by chapter 9 of the laws of 1978, is amended to read as follows:
    3    4. Each watcher must be a qualified voter of the  city  or  county  in
    4  which  he  OR  SHE  is  to serve, OR AN ATTORNEY WHO IS A NEW YORK STATE
    5  RESIDENT AND IS LICENSED TO PRACTICE LAW THEREIN.
    6    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.







        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD07321-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to watchers
